channel.title: CBP General
channel.description: A place for everyone to ask questions, post suggestions, or just chat about the CBP!

item.title: Almost nowhere to find CPB3 v4_v2 now
item.author: invalid@example.com (zqh9843)
item.dc:creator: zqh9843
item.content:encoded:
I didn't begin playing UT3 until a week ago, in the past you can download CBP from BU. BU CPB site was down for years.
Now that atomicgamer is also down.Nowhere to download CPB3 volume4 v2 now.
Yes there are mirrors in many sites like moddb fileplanet, but their files are corrupted.
Can anyone provide usable mirror?

item.title: UT3Dom5, CDOM CBP3 maps and network compatibility
item.author: invalid@example.com (WGH)
item.dc:creator: WGH
item.content:encoded:
I'm not sure who's responsible for this, you or UT3DOM team, but anyway.

One can play CBP3 CDOM maps using final UT3DOM version instead of bundled one without problems in single-player. But not in multi-player.

In short, when one's trying to connect to a server running CDOM CBP3 map and UT3Dom 5 he gets "Package mismatch UTDom" error. It's only reproducible on connect. Players present on the server during map travel won't be disconnected and will play fine (probably they bypass some...

UT3Dom5, CDOM CBP3 maps and network compatibility

item.title: Help with Installing Each Volume/Bonus Content
item.author: invalid@example.com (Shade_Koopa)
item.dc:creator: Shade_Koopa
item.content:encoded: I do not understand exactly where the files for each volume and bonus content go. Were does each volume and bonus content go? Also, do they go in the "program files" folder of UT3 or the "my document" folder of UT3?

item.title: Combined CBP3 Archive
item.author: invalid@example.com (shoptroll)
item.dc:creator: shoptroll
item.content:encoded: Would it be against any sort of T&C if i were to make a combined archive of all the CBP3 volumes? I've noticed that 7zip plays very nicely with Unreal map data + textures, and I would like to merge all 5 volumes into a single archive to save space on my computer.

Hey guys!

A guy asked me about how to install ut3 domination on steam,

someone can help?

thanks!

EDIT: Solved!

item.title: Congrats on cbp3 volume 5!!!
item.author: invalid@example.com (IntelliMoo)
item.dc:creator: IntelliMoo
item.content:encoded:
Wow, I almost can't believe it! I was shocked to see the news from the ut3 group today on Steam about this!

It's wonderful you guys are still making stuff for one of my favorite games ever. Good job and keep up the good work.

(Now just need updates for utdom5... )

item.title: UTDom 5 breaks DoubleDom in most CBP3 maps?
item.author: invalid@example.com (IntelliMoo)
item.dc:creator: IntelliMoo
item.content:encoded:
It seems trying to load most CBP3 dom maps (such as CDOM-CBP3-Velocity_v2) for Double Domination causes UT3 to either crash in wrap_oal.dll, or abruptly exit with a dialog about a runtime asked to terminate in a bad way or something. Normal Domination works fine in the CBP3 maps, though.

I know the CBP3 project is essentially dead, but I thought I'd just inform about this problem.

item.title: Thor Map Glitch
item.author: invalid@example.com (CBPBetaTester)
item.dc:creator: CBPBetaTester
item.content:encoded: While i was playing instant action on thor with titans titan launched me and i went into a wall where minigun is located its a wallbreach glitch when you feign death i'll post a video soon. When i found out about it i was like whaat then i was lolling

item.title: Is Domination mode bugged?
item.author: invalid@example.com (IntelliMoo)
item.dc:creator: IntelliMoo
item.content:encoded:
Whenever I play a Domination game for very long, I get the following UT3.exe crash (same every time):

Faulting application name: UT3.exe
Faulting module name: KERNELBASE.dll
Exception code: 0xe06d7363
Fault offset: 0x0000b727

Win 7 x64

item.title: LD available? (12 week prototype, starting now)
item.author: invalid@example.com (ambershee)
item.dc:creator: ambershee
item.content:encoded:
Edit: Blasted topic title should have a question mark in it D:

Hi guys,

As part of the university project I'm doing, this semester we've been commanded to construct a game prototype in 12 weeks (Easter not included, so the timeframe is a little larger), and I'll be working with two other programmers. Since peoples grades are reliant on the project being completed, there's a good guarantee of the project being completed to a reasonable level.

This week, we'll be working out which technical...

LD available? (12 week prototype, starting now)

item.title: CBP3 Volume 4 (version 2) zip file corrupted
item.author: invalid@example.com (jwtam)
item.dc:creator: jwtam
item.content:encoded:
only five maps in this latest CBP are corrupted and cannot be extracted:
CDOM-CBP3-Halcyon_v2.ut3
CDOM-CBP3-Velocity_v2.ut3
CDOM-CBP3-Yarith_v2.ut3
DM-CBP3-Halcyon_v2.ut3
WAR-CBP3-Midst_v2.ut3

I believe the person or persons responsible for the error need to re-upload the CBP Volume 4 v2 again to all game server websites. Someone should have posted the error about this earlier after that release as I couldn't find a topic thread relating to this. Both Moddb, Filefront and even possibly...

CBP3 Volume 4 (version 2) zip file corrupted

item.title: Concussion Field + Hoverboard = Suicide
item.author: invalid@example.com (Cockbite)
item.dc:creator: Cockbite
item.content:encoded:
The Concussion Field is a pretty awesome powerup, but I've noticed a small problem with it. If you try to use your hoverboard while the Concussion Field is active, you will be killed instantly and be credited with a suicide.

I think the problem is that you are taller when standing on your hoverboard, but the Field stays the same size, so your head hits the top of it and that kills you.

The powerup works great with the Manta and Viper though. I don't know if it was intended or not, but...

Concussion Field + Hoverboard = Suicide

item.title: CBP Vol4 v1-v2
item.author: invalid@example.com (gnrlspecific)
item.dc:creator: gnrlspecific
item.content:encoded:
Can anyone tell me. Do I need to uninstall CBP Vol4 v1 before installing CBP Vol4 v2? Or can I just install CBP Vol4 v2 on top of the existing CBP Vol4 v1?
Any help is much appreciated.

item.title: How you got into the industry
item.author: invalid@example.com (TheSpoonDog)
item.dc:creator: TheSpoonDog
item.content:encoded:
So... many of the CBP team members have been involved in the industry in some way or another. Some people like to know how, and I rekon this is a good place to just give a brief explanation of how you got your foot in the door

****************************************

My story is pretty simple really and probably not the most inspiring . I just made UT maps really.

I studied "Resource & Environmental Planning" at University for about a year and a half of the four years I was...

How you got into the industry

item.title: CTF-cbp3-Antediluvian
item.author: invalid@example.com (DarkSonny)
item.dc:creator: DarkSonny
item.content:encoded:
Heya all!
Great mappack dudes! I enjoyed a lot with those maps mainly DOm maps xd ...In the only map ctf i saw in both bases ( red and blue) that in corridor in L shape where is located a kind of windows embedded into walls ( red or blue depends where are you located at) necris designed for deco i think, there is a kind of hole or no bsp I fall into crossing the walls unintentionally, until death xd....Maybe need a fix and reupload the pack or ...?

Great job again!

item.title: Environment artists / LD's available?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Angel_Mapper)
item.dc:creator: Angel_Mapper
item.content:encoded:
I know most of you guys are probably busy with Vol 4, and this is pretty short notice, but would any of you be available for Prometheus? The environment art could really use more focus than I'm able to give it, since for the most part I'm busy with programming, design, level design and sound work. Phase 4 of the contest is coming up at the end of next month, and after that are the Grand Finals. Any prize money from the art side would be yours, as well as contract work on the commercial...

Environment artists / LD's available?
